description: Implement WCAG 2.1 AA compliance for identity-access module

workstreams.description: Create accessibility utility hooks and functions
Analyze existing components for accessibility baseline

decisions.decision: Create reusable accessibility utilities instead of modifying existing components
decisions.rationale: Existing components have good baseline accessibility. Creating utilities provides more value for future development without risking breaking changes.

decisions.decision: Document recommended enhancements instead of forcing component updates
decisions.rationale: SessionWarningModal already has a good manual focus trap implementation. Forcing updates could introduce bugs. Better to provide utilities for new components and optional migration path.
Testing documentation provides more long-term value than modifying individual components. Developers can use guides to maintain accessibility standards.
